1 #include "JointVelocityController.h"
2 
3 JointVelocityController::JointVelocityController() {
4  // Switch to velocity controller
5  std::vector<std::string> velocity_controller_names; velocity_controller_names.reserve(7);
6  std::vector<std::string> position_controller_names; position_controller_names.reserve(7);
7  for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
8  velocity_controller_names.push_back("panda_joint" + std::to_string(i+1) + "_velocity_controller");
9  position_controller_names.push_back("panda_joint" + std::to_string(i+1) + "_position_controller");
10  }
11  position_controller_names.push_back("panda_joint_trajectory_controller");
12  ros::ServiceClient switch_controller = n.serviceClient<controller_manager_msgs::SwitchController>("/controller_manager/switch_controller");
13  controller_manager_msgs::SwitchController srv;
14  srv.request.start_controllers = velocity_controller_names;
15  srv.request.stop_controllers = position_controller_names;
16  srv.request.strictness = 1;
17  srv.request.start_asap = true;
18  srv.request.timeout = 10.0;
19  switch_controller.call(srv);
20 
21  // Set up publishers
22  publishers.reserve(7);
23  for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
24  publishers.push_back(n.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("panda_joint" +
25  std::to_string(i+1) +
26  "_velocity_controller/command", 1));
27  }
28  realPublisher = n.advertise<std_msgs::Float64MultiArray>("panda_joint_velocity_controller/command", 1);
29  msgarray.data.resize(7);
30 }
31 
32 JointVelocityController::~JointVelocityController() {
33 }
34 
35 void JointVelocityController::sendVelocities(const Eigen::VectorXd vel)
36 {
37  if (vel.size() == 7)
38  {
39  for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++){
40  if (!std::isnan(vel[i]))
41  {
42  msg.data = vel[i];
43  msgarray.data[i] = vel[i];
44  publishers[i].publish(msg);
45  }
46  else
47  {
48  ROS_ERROR("NaN values can't be published as joint velocities");
49  ROS_ERROR("Shutting down");
50  ros::shutdown();
51  }
52  }
53  realPublisher.publish(msgarray);
54  }
55  else
56  {
57  ROS_ERROR_ONCE("The published vector must contain 7 elements");
58  }
59 }
